import React from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../products"; const ProductScreen = () => { let { id } = useParams(); const product = products.find((product) => product._id === id); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

Price: ${product.price}

 Price ${product.price} Status {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out Of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
